name: Goblin Gunner
description:
Gobbo is a famished goblin in need of a cartoonishly large meat shank. Fight through hordes of enemies in this fantasy western meld. Obtain *rare* meats through combat with mobs, or through the grizzled shopkeepers, who you're pretty sure are short-changing you. Upgrade your weapon and character stats, and collect unique utility items to help you defeat your foes, and make it to your dream dinner!
-----------------------------------------------------------------

THIS IS AN EARLY BUILD - PLEASE READ BELOW

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:

- Fire: Right Shoulder Button or Left Click 

- Reload: Right Trigger or Right Click

- Move: Left Analogue Stick or WASD

- Aim: Right Analogue Stick or Mouse

- Pause: Start or Esc
